description: Provides collaboration options: social subsystem and mobwrite

params.name: message

params.name: group
params.description: An optional group name or leave blank to list groups

params.name: group
params.description: The name of the group to add to

params.name: members

params.name: group

params.name: project
params.description: The name of an existing project

params.name: member

params.name: project
params.description: Project name to alter sharing on
